description:
If an instance cleanup fails with an exception, no more instances will be cleaned up.
If the failure is permanent, this will block other instances from being cleaned up for as long as it remains.
title: Periodic cleanup of running instances stops on first error

comments.content:
If an instance cleanup fails with an exception, no more instances will be cleaned up.
If the failure is permanent, this will block other instances from being cleaned up for as long as it remains.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/33715
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/941984e6aba8e8169bbce82bfa40bf2c827a114a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 941984e6aba8e8169bbce82bfa40bf2c827a114a
Author: Hans Lindgren <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jun 19 23:06:56 2013 +0200

    Make sure periodic cleanup of instances continues on error
    
    If an instance cleanup fails with an exception, no more instances
    will be cleaned up. If the failure is permanent, this will block
    other instances from being cleaned up for as long as it remains.
    
    Resolves bug 1192712.
    
    Change-Id: Ibdd69817ee0e6d0963637f38a8be3949e6e053ed
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
